item.title: GE Vernova now sees tariff costs of up to $400 million but keeps outlook intact
item.description: GE Vernova’s stock surged Wednesday after the power and renewable-energy company reported quarterly profit that was more than double expectations.

item.title: Tariffs could push up homeowners insurance premiums — and people in these states would see the biggest price hikes
item.description: Tariffs on construction materials could push the average homeowner’s annual insurance premium up to $3,626 by the end of the year, Insurify projects.

item.title: Tesla’s stock is rising, but will Musk’s return revive it for good? It’s not so simple.
item.description: There are various challenges ahead, including tariffs, an evolving EV market and a history of delays on new products.

item.title: Scott Bessent offers a gentler message again, saying ‘America First’ does not mean ‘America alone’
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent spoke Wednesday at an Institute of International Finance event in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Trump and Powell are doing a ‘Fed independence’ dance. Keep your portfolio flexible.
item.description: Inflation shocks, the dollar’s decline and political winds are threats to your money now.
